caption.p: A summary of published literature regarding alpine-stream taxonomic groups and food webs in glacier-fed rivers from 1976 to 2017. The data extracted from the Web of Science (3 March 2017) were based on the following search criteria and mixtures thereof: taxa, alpine, river, stream, food web, and glacier. These search combinations identified research within glacier-fed rivers, even if they were not identified as such within publication titles.
